boardgame.name: Alte Dunkle Dinge
Ancient Terrible Things
boardgame.description: In Ancient Terrible Things, a pulp horror adventure game for 2-4 players, you play the role of an intrepid adventurer, exploring a dark jungle river. Each turn you must travel to a Fateful Location, face an Ominous Encounter, and attempt to unlock its Ancient Secrets. If you succeed (using a combination of dice, tokens and cards), you add the Secrets to your score; if you fail, you unleash a Terrible Thing, which counts against your score at the end of the game. The object of the game is to be the player with the most Ancient Secrets when the game ends at the Unspeakable Event._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game play involves rolling dice to achieve combinations: runs, pairs, three or more of a kind, and single die showing a particular number or higher. Dice combos are used to overcome Encounter cards that are worth points at the end of the game, and/or to acquire the four resource tokens in the game: Focus, Courage, Treasure and Feat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Focus tokens are used to re-roll individual dice. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Courage tokens are spent to overcome an Encounter, before rolling your dice. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Treasure tokens are spent to purchase Swag cards from the Trading Post, which give you a permanent game effect._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Feat tokens are spent to play Feat cards from your hand, which activate one-shot effects._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is hugely atmospheric game of Lovecraftian horror. The players attempt to unlock ancient secrets â€“ and thus gain points â€“ but not awaken the eponymous beings. This is one of those games you play as much for the experience as winning. The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is Â£33.33 (net of UK tax - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country). Pleasant Company Games (PCGAT02) The history of the doomed expedition is shrouded in whispered parlor rumor. A group of adventurers set out by riverboat, deep into a remote jungle, in foolish pursuit of fortune and glory. The battered journal of the lone survivor, said to contain fantastical scribblings of ancient secrets and terrible things awakened, was soon consigned to the sanatorium furnace. In Ancient Terrible Things, you play the role of an intrepid adventurer, exploring a dark jungle river. Each turn you must travel to a Fateful Location, face an Ominous Encounter and attempt to unlock its Ancient Secrets. If you succeed (using a combination of dice, tokens and cards), you add the Secrets to your score. If you fail, you unleash a Terrible Thing, which counts against your score at the end of the game. The object of the game is to be the player with the most Ancient Secrets when the game ends at the Unspeakable Event.
